I have 2 things to say:

1.  PLEASE, PLEASE VOTE IN THIS POLL!!!!  I'M TOTALLY DIVIDED AND 
NEED AN OUTSIDE TIEBREAKER!!!!  I JUST CAN'T DECIDE!!!!

and

2.  Is it possible to remain annonamous when you request the council 
makes a poll?

him.
